meanings.definition: Covered or soaked in too much sauce.
meanings.sent1: The pasta was oversauced and tasted too salty.
meanings.sent2: The oversauced pizza was dripping with excess tomato sauce.
meanings.sent3: The oversauced sandwich was so wet, it slipped out of my hands!
meanings.sent4: Her oversauced salad was like a swimming pool of dressing.
meanings.sent5: The oversauced steak was a soggy mess on the plate.

meanings.definition: To add too much sauce to something.
meanings.sent1: I accidentally oversauced the spaghetti, making it too soggy.
meanings.sent2: She oversauced the chicken wings, making them too spicy to eat.
meanings.sent3: He oversauced the burger, creating a messy masterpiece.
meanings.sent4: The chef oversauced the dish, drowning out the flavors.
meanings.sent5: They oversauced the noodles until they were swimming in sauce.
